name: obsidian-s3-image-uploader
description: A simple and efficient S3 image uploader for Obsidian

scripts.install-plugin: npm run build && rm -rf ~/.obsidian/plugins/obsidian-s3-image-uploader* && mkdir -p ~/.obsidian/plugins/obsidian-s3-image-uploader-pro && cp main.js manifest.json ~/.obsidian/plugins/obsidian-s3-image-uploader-pro/
scripts.version: node version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json

author: Your Name
